import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Col, Container, Form, Row, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { APICitas } from "../../api/api"; import styles from "./AppointmentPage.module.css"; const AppointmentPage = () => { const [appointment, setAppointment] = useState({}); const handleChange = (e) => { console.log(e.target.value); setAppointment({ ...appointment, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const handleSubmit = async () => { const response = await APICitas.createCita({ user: appointment["nombre"], apellidos: appointment["apellidos"], telefono: appointment["telefono"], email: appointment["email"], fecha: appointment["fecha"], hora: appointment["hora"], descripcion: appointment["descripcion"], }); // getUser(response); console.log(response); }; return (

Reservar Cita

Datos Personales

Nombre Apellidos Teléfono Correo electrónico

Datos de la Cita

Fecha de la Cita Hora de la Cita Descripción o Síntomas
); }; export default AppointmentPage;
